Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: SYS_ADMIN capability added
Misconfigurations.Description: SYS_ADMIN gives the processes running inside the container privileges that are equivalent to root.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should not include 'SYS_ADMIN' in 'securityContext.capabilities.add'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.requests.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.requests.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Privileged
Misconfigurations.Description: Privileged containers share namespaces with the host system and do not offer any security. They should be used exclusively for system containers that require high privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.privileged' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hosts user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hosts user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hosts user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hosts user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'csi-provisioner' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hosts user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hosts user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'liveness-probe' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Specific capabilities added
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Capabilities', capabilities beyond the default set must not be added.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'juicefs-plugin' of StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should not set 'securityContext.capabilities.add'

Misconfigurations.Title: hostPath volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'HostPath Volumes', HostPath volumes must be forbidden.
Misconfigurations.Message: StatefulSet 'juicefs-csi-controller' should not set 'spec.template.volumes.hostPath'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container csi-provisioner of statefulset juicefs-csi-controller in  namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container juicefs-plugin of statefulset juicefs-csi-controller in  namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container liveness-probe of statefulset juicefs-csi-controller in  namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: statefulset juicefs-csi-controller in  namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset juicefs-csi-node in  namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0

Misconfigurations.Title: Kubernetes resource with disallowed volumes mounted
Misconfigurations.Description: HostPath present many security risks and as a security practice it is better to avoid critical host paths mounts.
Misconfigurations.Message: daemonset juicefs-csi-node in  namespace shouldn't have volumes set to {"/dev"}
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Do not Set 'spec.volumes[*].hostPath.path' to any of the disallowed volumes.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-node-service-role' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-provisioner-role' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Delete pod logs
Misconfigurations.Description: Used to cover attackers tracks, but most clusters ship logs quickly off-cluster.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-provisioner-role' should not have access to resource 'pods/log' for verbs ["delete", "deletecollection", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove verbs 'delete' and 'deletecollection' for resource 'pods/log' for Role and ClusterRole

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-node-service-role' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-node-service-role' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-provisioner-role' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-provisioner-role' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-provisioner-role' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes networking
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to control which pods get service traffic directed to them allows for interception attacks. Controlling network policy allows for bypassing lateral movement restrictions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'juicefs-csi-external-provisioner-role' should not have access to resources ["services", "endpoints", "endpointslices", "networkpolicies", "ingresses"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Networking resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrole juicefs-csi-external-node-service-role in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.
